sentence.idiomatic: Where is the subway station around here?
That's the local park.
My apartment is not in a community near here.
This is a living room.
I have two bedrooms.
Is that kitchen ours? Yes.
Is the shop next door open? Yes.
The book next to you is mine.
There is no one living in the room next to mine.
Please go with Mr. Wang.
Who will go eat with me?
Ms. Li will not go singing with them.
I'll take you to see the room.
Mr. Wang took Ms. Li out to eat.
Where are you taking me? I'm taking you to Mr. Zhang's home.
Are you coming to see the house? Let me introduce it to you.
OK.
This is the kitchen. Next to it is the toilet. This is the living room and the bedroom is behind it. How do you feel about the house?
It's OK. I think the toilet is a little bit small and the living room is a little bit dark.
You are right, but the bedroom is very large. Would you like to rent it?
I will consider it.
